bio.value:
Eileen Wilks was born in the dusty little town of Monahans, Texas, to the usual number of parents. She's done a lot of wandering since then, having lived in Canada and Venezuela as well as twelve U.S. cities in five states. She wandered a lot professionally, too, before finding her home in writing. A four-time finalist in RWA's prestigious RITA contest, she is the recipient of a Career Achievement Award from Romantic Times.

Source:  [About the Author](https://www.amazon.com/stores/author/B000APLAHC/about)

alternate_names: Feehan, Christine; Sutcliffe, Katherine; Brand, Fiona; Wilks, Eileen
name: Eileen Wilks
